entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then cloudy with 70 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
